edu.biu.protocols.CommitmentWithZkProofOfDifference

Class CmtWithDifferenceCommitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.CommitmentWithZkProofOfDifference.CmtWithDifferenceCommitter

  • public class CmtWithDifferenceCommitter
extends java.lang.Object
    This protocol is used in the input consistency check.

    It reveals the xor of both committed values without revealing the committed values themselves.

    Meaning, given two commitments: Hcom(s) Hcom(s'), we want to reveal s^s' without revealing s and s'.

    This class represents the committer of the protocol.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

      • CmtWithDifferenceCommitter

        public CmtWithDifferenceCommitter(byte[][] x,
                          int numCircuits,
                          int statisticalParameter,
                          Channel channel,
                          java.security.SecureRandom random,
                          CryptographicHash hash)
        A constructor that sets the given parameters and initialize them.
        Parameters:
        x - The actual committed values.
        numCircuits - The total number of circuits. (checked + eval)
        statisticalParameter - Indicates how much commitments pairs will be.
        channel - Used to communicate between the parties.
        random - Used to initialize the commitment scheme.
        hash - Used in the commitment scheme.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
           throws java.io.IOException
        The setup phase of the protocol. Receives from the receiver the wCommitment, kCommitment and cutAndChooseSelectionCiphertext.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of a problem during the receiving.

      • getCommitments

        public CmtCCommitmentMsg[][] getCommitments()
        Creates all commitment pairs for all secrets and puts the created commitments in a big array
        Returns:
        an array contains all created commitments.

      • receiveCutAndChooseSelection

        public CutAndChooseSelection receiveCutAndChooseSelection()
                                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                                          CheatAttemptException
        Receives the cut and choose selection according to the following steps: 1. Receive kDecommitment, verifies it. 2. If not verified, throw a cheating exception. 3. If verified, convert the committed value into a key. 4. Decrypt the cutAndChooseSelectionCiphertext to get the cut and choose selection.
        Returns:
        The cut and choose selection, if everything went good.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of a problem during the communication.
        CheatAttemptException - If the received kDecommitment was not verified.

      • getDecommit

        public void getDecommit(int k,
               int counter,
               DecommitmentsPackage pack)
        Puts in the given package the required secret, all randoms for this secret and all decommitments objects.
        Parameters:
        k - The index of the required secret.
        counter - The placed in the package were the secret, randoms and secommitments should be placed.
        pack - The package that will be sent to the other party and should be filled woth the secret, randoms and decryptions.

      • getBundle

        public DifferenceCommitmentCommitterBundle getBundle(int k)
        Returns a DifferenceCommitmentCommitterBundle that contains some data of this protocol.
        Parameters:
        k - The index of the required secret and related commitments.

      • proveDifferencesBetweenMasks

        public void proveDifferencesBetweenMasks(java.util.ArrayList<DifferenceCommitmentCommitterBundle> bucket)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                         CheatAttemptException
        Proves the difference by committing to the difference of each pair of bundles, receive w and than send the decommitments of the differences.
        Parameters:
        bucket - Contains the DifferenceCommitmentCommitterBundle to prove.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        CheatAttemptException
